reviewText: I am a big fan of the Little Couple, the dvd doesnt disappoint, its very good. You learn alot about the struggles of little people and Jen & Bill are adorable and very likeable. You will enjot this dvd alot.

This show is definitely not advertised enough on tv. I luckily came across this show by chance in Season 3 and simply fell in love with Bill and Jen. Since I missed the first 2 seasons I had to order their dvd to catch up. I can't wait for the next one to come out!

I love watching shows about little people.  It's very interesting to me to see how they live with what the Lord handed them.  With what I have seen so far, they have done a great job, superbly!!  In fact sometimes I think little people handle their lives better that big people.  I would give this series 5 stars!!!!!

The Little Couple take on their unique challenges with humor and poise. Jen and Bill have giant personalities that allow them to succeed in a world that defines people by strict standards of size and beauty. The love and care they show each other and the people around them makes me want to tune in each week to see what's next in their lives. The video allows me to catch an episode any time I want. I anxiously await the next Little Couple video.

GREAT DVD!! My husband and I are "average sized" senior citizens (64 and 77) who just recently started watching the "Little Couple" episodes on TV.  In today's world with so many negative happenings occuring, it is a great pleasure for us to watch this very loving couple in their day to day life events.  They are loving and very respectful of each other. This program has become our favorite program of the week.  We splurged and bought this DVD collection of their first season of shows and now we watch them EVERY NIGHT for a pleasant break in our day.  The collection of shows is great and we highly recommended the DVD set to everyone of all ages and "sizes!!"  We look forward to a future DVD set of Season Two!
I love this family.  They are so down to earth and cannot wait to see them every week.  keep the Dvd's coming about this terrific family.
Brought for my Mom she loved this series and she is looking forward to getting the next DVD when it comes out.
Would definitely buy more of these episodes if they were available.  Don't really understand why they are not.  Love this show and the family on it.
Most of the episodes that I miss that most. I really, really love the little couple and their heart is so good each other and friendly to everyone.
I love this season1 dvd set as I missed a lot. I want the rest of the seasons on dvd!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This is one of my favorite shows. Glad to see that it was out on DVD. Now we just need to get the other seasons out on DVD.
I love this series and will share it with others.  Jen and Bill have great personalities and I am enjoying catching up with them!

I received this yesterday, and I have already watched the first disk.  I have watched the show for the last year and I so admire this couple. Their outlook on life is so refreshing.  They have had to deal with so many health problems growing up, and still they are so loving and kind and still have acheived so very much dispite their size.  I can't wait for the new season to start so I can enjoys seeing this remarkable couple, son Will, (such a darling little boy) and their new daughter Zoey.
This tape has given me much information on the early life of this remarkable couple.  Everyone should watch this trully inspiring couple!!!!

Love it but want more. Can't believe that this is the only DVD of the long series. Can anyone explain?
I actually feel like they are family.
I love the show and have downloaded almost every episode from Amazon but I can not find their wedding special and was wondering if this has there wedding episode on it?
I love this series and loved this DVD.  But I need Seasons 2-6 on DVD too!  I hope they are coming out.  I like watching them on my tv while I work on the computer.
I LOVED IT, I WISH THEY HAD OTHER SEASONS AVAILABLE IN DVD NOT JUST DOWNLOAD, CAUSE I WOULD BUY THEM IF THEY WERE AVAILABLE
I love watching the Little Couple on TV.  I wish there were more season's available on DVD.  That's all I have to say.
This set of two DVD's are great - I just wish I could get the other seasons on DVD also!! This is the sweetest couple and I really enjoy watching their show. You will love it!!

What's up with not being able to buy the DVD of the Little Couple from season 2-6? I would love to have the DVD's but am not willing to pay to watch it on my TV. When are you going to get it together and sale seasons 2-6? I won't even buy season 1 until the rest is out to buy on DVD. I like to buy them all at once so I can just watch the shows straight through. You're going down hill Amazon. And also, we'd like to see more BBC/British shows for sale in OUR region.
Why in the world is it almost impossible to get another version?  I want to give this as a gift for a person without a computer and can only get it on screening?  That is useless in this situation.

Been loving the Little Couple show on TLC - Got season 1 and loved it especially since it takes place in Houston ,Tx and that's where I live. however where are the other seasons on dvd at? You can watch them on Instant video here at Amazon but no dvds to be purchased - I would rather watch them on my tv on dvd- season 5 just started up and you gotta love Jen and Bill-  Please put the other seasons out on dvd !
She was happy with this show and all the discs was in great shape so I give this an A+ rating and if I had this purchase to do over again I would!
This show is so entertaining.  Seeing how the couple deals with everyday life is quite interesting, and who doesn't love Jen's laugh ;)

Just received this for a Christmas gift! It's fun to watch without commercial interruptions.  You appreciate the reality t.v. programs that show positive relationships and people you admire.  I watched the entire first DVD and I look forward to watching the second.  Nice to be able to find some DVDs you can watch and watch again!
wonderfully done watch an episode daily very motivating
Yes it was
I love this series. Just wondering if anyone knows the status of seasons 2 and 3? Are they ever going to be available?
Love this show.

Great show
People need to watch this show. It makes your heart warm .These people are very strong and they love each other so much .We could learn something from them .
The little couple DVD was great. Good family show

I started this series but I couldn't see how it began. I searched until I found this CD. It is great and I also got to see clips explaining how they met, how Bill proposed and how they looked in the wedding attire.  I was so pleased that this set was available since this is my favorite show..  This series is about the relationship between husband and wife and the fact that they are a little couple in stature and how they are treated/live is the focus of the show..
Love love love this show!  They are an amazing couple and so positive.  Very uplifting.
Love this series, and thrilled to get season 1 DVD, but can not find Season 2 or 3 anywhere!!!!

This product came in great timing.  It was very nice packaging and the product was excellent.  I choose this product bc I LOVE the little couple and I wanted to watch more of them.  I would recommend this product to  ANYONE and EVERYONE!!
